mapper.insert: insert into report_manage_log ( id, service_period_id, site_code, site_name, send_time, send_state, send_wx_state, create_time ) values ( #{id}, #{servicePeriodId}, #{siteCode}, #{siteName}, now(), #{sendState}, #{sendWxState}, now() )
mapper.select:
SELECT a.site_code AS siteCode, a.site_name AS siteName, a.send_time AS sendTime, a.send_state AS sendState, c.dic_site_id AS dicSiteId, c.dic_combo_id AS dicComboId, c.service_begin_time AS serviceBeginTime, b.start_time AS startTime, b.period_num AS periodNum FROM report_manage_log a, service_period b, website_info c WHERE a.site_code = b.site_code AND a.site_code = c.site_code AND a.service_period_id = b.id AND a.site_code LIKE '53%'
AND a.site_code IN
#{websiteIdList.siteCode}
and #{nowTime} BETWEEN c.service_begin_time AND c.service_end_time
and a.create_time like '${createTime}%'
ORDER BY a.send_time DESC

SELECT COUNT(a.site_code) AS siteCodeNum, SUM(CASE WHEN a.send_state=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS successNum, SUM(CASE WHEN a.send_state=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS errorNum FROM report_manage_log a,service_period b WHERE a.service_period_id=b.id
and b.period_num=#{periodNum}
